title: Farming Games Music Pack
description: 43 Tracks & 52 mins of Happy Folk Music
longDescription:
This collection features 10 original folk acoustic tracks that are perfect for a variety of games, including farming simulations, RPGs, casual games, puzzles, and more. You will find beautiful music themes presented in full-length ending versions, loops and stingers variations, providing a versatile soundtrack for game developers.

The cheerful and catchy whistling melodies, along with the playful live instruments such as mallets, ukulele, banjo, guitars, piano, percussions, accordion, and many others, create a lively and upbeat atmosphere that enhances the player's experience.

The album's influences come from Country and Children's music, resulting in a delightful and enjoyable listening experience. This music collection is sure to make any game more fun, memorable, and immersive.


Preview of all 10 main tracks﻿:

technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  1. Cute Puppies (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  2. Kids Games (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  3. Kids Club (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  4. Playful Strum (main track, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  5. Sweet Melody (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  6. Feel Lucky (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  7. Happy Whistle (main track, 2 loops)
  8. Toy Room (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  9. Playground Time (main track, 5 loops, 1 stinger)
  10. When I Grow Up (main track, 2 loops)


Number of Audio Wavs: 43

Number of Audio Cues: 43

Sample rate/bit rate: 16-bit / 44.1 Khz format

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 52:43

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://www.francescobiondimusic.com/

Additional Notes: In addition to using this music within the video game, you are authorized to use it for promotional videos on YouTube. Please fill out our form to quickly clear any Content Id claim on your video - https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/.
